creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: image stitched together with colorful cloth with beads and sequined overlay; central figure with green veil with gold halo; blue and white lined necklace, wearing white and purple smock; figure holds object with both hands that is in the shape of a house on a triangular base; silver border; black sequined diamond shapes on top edge; two black squares in URC and ULC; black, green, blue and pink diamond shapes on right and left edges of border; text on bottom border that reads "LAREINE CONCOT"; text below hands of figure that reads "BOSS LALANNE"; cream colored cloth backing
title: "LaReine Concot" voodoo flag
